nodes.text: This Tammuz-an individual was the father of King Mon Julpa.

He was a member of the royal family on Tammuz-an and taught his son about a secret entrance into the dungeon of the royal castle. The man had died at some point before Mon Julpa returned to Tammuz-an, as his son and the Vizier Ko Zatec-Cha were the only contenders to the throne.
